title: 關於腳本的lore運用
author: monkey00000
txt_content:
請問怎麼偵測腳本的lore屬性標籤和GUI裡面的???
範例題材:
攻擊力: +20
還有....
為啥我用
On damage:
    set {test} to 2
    set damage to damage*{test}
    broadcast "%damage%"
會顯示 0

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
加属性插件配合lore插件食用

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-793362-1-1.html

replies.txt_content:
